name: Pixel Art Shooter
description:
Pixel Art Shooter is a physics-based puzzle game where you must fling spheres into a grid of colored tiles.

Slide the deflector above the column you want to drop the sphere into and line them up. Don't send the wrong color into the column or you will dump the whole row.

To get a free copy of a game and stay up to date with my latest games, be sure to subscribe to my mailing list.
